results.title: Doctor Informed State of 10-Year-Old Girl’s Abortion
results.abstract: A document obtained by The New York Times shows that the Indiana obstetrician reported the child’s abortion to the state.

media.caption: Indiana’s attorney general, Todd Rokita, told Fox News he intended to investigate Dr. Caitlin Bernard. He suggested she failed to file required reports after performing a 10-year-old’s abortion, an assertion that appears to be refuted by a state document.
